abstract: The death of the Duke of Clarence, Queen Victoria’s grandson, prompted an outpouring of sympathy.
lead_paragraph: LONDON — The profound sensation which was created by the death of the Duke of Clarence is, of course, subsiding; but the possible results of that event on the succession to the Crown still afford much food for reflection to those who look a little way ahead.
snippet: The death of the Duke of Clarence, Queen Victoria’s grandson, prompted an outpouring of sympathy....

headline.main: 1892: In Britain, Duke’s Death Strengthens Affection for Royal Family
